name: Escape The Night 2
description:
Escape The Night 2 is the sequel of the horror game series created by Darko Markan.
The story from the original game continues when the main character's boat gets sunk by a large underwater monster. He then must find a way to the surface to survive.
Explore various locations in the game, solve puzzles, collect items and memorize the paths to finish the game.
Can you survive underwater and escape the night?
Find out in this amazing horror adventure game.
